thread.title: Swedish Academy Won’t Award Nobel Prize in Literature This Year

author: wsjcom
title: Swedish Academy Won’t Award Nobel Prize in Literature This Year
text:
The institution responsible for awarding a prize spawned by the father of dynamite is in pieces: It won’t name a Nobel winner in literature this year.
The Swedish Academy, which has awarded the prestigious prize since its creation in 1901, said Friday it needs time to repair the damage from a protracted scandal over allegations of sexual assault and financial impropriety.
The...
